The headline from Realtimepolitics: a hoax website, claiming that Joe Biden confirmed his candidacy for president in 2020.
The report by The Political Voice in Feb: which mentioned Joe Biden's plans for 2020 but had a more vague headline.
The Associated Press: AP) report stating that Biden was "tiptoeing toward a potential presidential run in 2020" and had discussed the possibility with longtime policy aides.
Biden: s own statement on The View, where he mentioned the possibility of running for president in 2020 if no strong Democratic candidate emerged.
